version_description:
Game Balance Changes
-Officer Skills and Effects ADJUSTED!
-Some Skill activation and Effect bugs FIXED!
-New Redesigned Starter Pack contents BOOSTED!
-7 New Samurai Shodown Collaboration Characters ADDED!
-Hot Time purchasing ADDED!
-Training Yard System ADDED!
-A.I. Targeting in Battle ADJUSTED!
Please visit our Facebook Page for more details!

-New Chu-Han Conflict Officers added!
-Welcome Xiang Yu and his pals!
-New Officer Collections!
-Rush Boss Battles!
-More detailed Officer Skills!
-New Missions/Achievements!
-New Limited Time Sales Packages!
-New Relics and Treasures!
-Max Officer Roster increased!
-Many Bugs EXTERMINATED!

-7 New Chu-Han Officers ADDED
-Chat Filter Functions IMPROVED
-17 New Team Bonuses ADDED
-Normal Recruits IMPROVED
-Ascetics and Relics SELLABLE
-Incorrect Crowd Control Effect Bugs FIXED
-Wang Yi, Ma Chao, Yan Liang, Zhongli Mu BUFFED
-Sima Hui's Shop Medals IMPROVED
​

​Patch Summary:
- Rebalanced Officers
- Reduced item requirements for certain 7-star Equipment
- 4 new Officers with new team bonuses!
- Compete against Monarchs from all over the world in the World Monarch Tournament!​

- 5 new Officers with new Team Bonuses!
- Several Officer Balance changes!
- Bugs squashed!
- Various other improvements made!

New Team Bonuses ADDED!

New Officers and Remakes ADDED!

Bugs SQUASHED!

UI and UX ENHANCED!

- Various system improvements!
